body: Well I'm running out of ideas to do on Avicus of course I have the commentary series going on but I want to know what you guys want me to upload on Avicus e.g scrim highlights or tips anything that can get me some new ideas. It would really help if you could post down below what you want me to do so I can perhaps do some new things for my channel you never know. I will try to do as much as you guys want me to!

title: What do YOU guys want me to do?

replies.body: Start survival lets play on Avicus DTM maps :D

replies.body: do highlights of all the scrims that we havent played
